rows.label: qev090204_MSG0001
rows.name: Right, then. Let's see what she's got for us, pard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0002
rows.name: What the...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0003
rows.name: Hold the phone. This is...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0004
rows.name:
This is his arm. It's gotta be! I knew it!
I knew I'd find somethin'![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0005
rows.name:
Don't you see what this means?
He's here! On Mira somewhere, he's here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0006
rows.name: I knew it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0006_2
rows.name: He's out there! He's ALIVE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0010
rows.name: Stare

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Yelv that you do not understand what he is saying.

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0020
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest that Yelv calms down.

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0007
rows.name: Oh, right. Guess I still ain't told you yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0008
rows.name: How's a guy supposed to be CALM after this, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0009
rows.name: It's his arm, see?! It's proof he's out there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0010
rows.name: ...Oh, wait a sec. I still ain't told you, have I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0011
rows.name: Well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0012
rows.name: I guess I can trust ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0013
rows.name: But it's about my best friend, so just keep it between us, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0031
rows.name: Promise Yelv that you will not tell a soul.

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0040
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Yelv that he can wait if he prefers to.

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0014
rows.name:
Probably should'a told you all this way earlier.
We're partners, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0015
rows.name: No, I want to tell ya. Besides, it involves you now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0016
rows.name:
Me and my buddy went to school together.We enlisted
together. Hell, we were even born in the same hospital.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0017
rows.name:
We'd been partners from day one.
...Till we came here to Mira, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0018
rows.name: The day the Whale fell, he...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0019
rows.name:
He was back evacuatin' the other crew,
when all of a sudden there was this...explosion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0020
rows.name: Typical, really. He was always helpin' some poor sap out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0021
rows.name: It's why he stuck with a jerk like me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0022
rows.name: Still, I couldn't stop thinkin' he was out there somewhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0023
rows.name:
So I started searchin' all the Whale wreckage
tryin' to find a trace...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0024
rows.name: And here it is. His left arm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0025
rows.name:
Crazy, ain't it? He even gave his mimeosome the same
cross-shaped scar he had.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0050
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Yelv what his friend was like.

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0060
rows.name: Caution

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Yelv that his friend is likely dead.

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0026
rows.name: I never really fit in, so he was always lookin' out for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0027
rows.name:
He was the golden child back in high school,
but he never ditched me once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0028
rows.name: Out in the field, we were always watchin' each others' backs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0029
rows.name:
He was smart as they came, 'cept when it came
to riskin' his neck for someone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0030
rows.name: Best partner a guy could want...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0031
rows.name:
Hey, you ain't been found till recently,
and you're still breathin'![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0032
rows.name: He's alive. I feel it in my gut. In my bones...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0033
rows.name: Knowin' him, he's off helpin' somebody.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0034
rows.name:
Probably runnin' errands for some weirdo tribe of xenos.
With one arm, no less![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0035
rows.name: Maybe he's got a new one...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0036
rows.name: I don't care what anyone says. I'm gonna find him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0037
rows.name:
The whole reason I joined the Reclaimers was to get first crack
at the wreckage, and I'll do whatever else I have to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0038
rows.name: Soooo...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0039
rows.name: That kinda dragged on, huh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0040
rows.name: Guess I can't help thinkin' about him when I see you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0041
rows.name: Can't help talkin' either.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0070
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask how you fit in with all this.

rows.label: qev090204_JNK0080
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: qev090204_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask if there is some kind of physical resemblance.

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0042
rows.name:
I dunno. You just...feel the same, yeah?
You got the same presence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0043
rows.name: When I look at ya, I don't see it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0044
rows.name: But then I forget, and it's like he's right here with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0045
rows.name:
Nah, nothin' like that. You and him don't really
square up in the ol' face department.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0046
rows.name: Fact is, when I look at ya, I don't see it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0047
rows.name:
But then I forget for a second,
and it's like he's right here with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0048
rows.name:
I know he's alive here on Mira.
Same as I know the sky's blue.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0049
rows.name: Next job like this we find, let's do it together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090204_MSG0050
rows.name:
Once we find him, we can take turns beatin'
on him for disappearin' like that![ST:wait ]
